list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: push oneself off a surface and into the air by using the muscles in one's legs and feet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the cat jumped off his lap

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person) move suddenly and quickly in a specified way.
(of a place) be full of lively activity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the bar is jumping on Fridays and Saturdays
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thanh đang nhảy vào thứ Sáu và thứ Bảy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of jumping from a surface by pushing upward with one's legs and feet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in making the short jump across the gully he lost his balance
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong việc nhảy nhanh trên khe, anh ta mất thăng bằng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a sudden involuntary movement caused by shock or surprise.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I woke up with a jump
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi thức dậy với một cú nhảy
